views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

A YouTube enhancer.
Configure in the Settings app.

Respring!

Feedback and donations are appreciated! :D

+ Switches are much more organized now! + Added 4 more switches in User Interface + Added description for certain switches! (Just tap on the switch label). + Under-the-hood upgrades. * Stay tuned for update 3.0. (It's going to be great!) Bear with me while I learn. Minor update

+ Internal Fixes
+ Pop Up is Now Optional
+ Added 1 More Support Link
+ Fresh Icons


+ Requires iOS 9+
+ Added more switches!
+ Cleaner labels

- Removed iOS 8 support
